CodeList.Name: Patient Determined Disease Steps Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Patient Determined Disease Steps test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Patient Determined Disease Steps - This scale focuses mainly on how well you walk. You might not find a description that reflects your condition exactly, but please mark the one category that describes your situation the closest.

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Patient Determined Disease Steps Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire PDDS Test Code Terminology
